text: Di kaphe biyoh teuma jibantah Jikheun di kamoe han meu meuiman Got nyan Qurâ€™an nyang gata peugah Got pih nyang laen dilee nibaknyan g Bandum atranyan sit kamoe bantah Sangkira taeu awak lalem nyan Watee Neuyue dong teuma le Allah Awak nyoe jikheun salah awak jeh Teuma awak jeh jikheun nyoe salah Nyang leumoh jikheun ubak keutua Adak kon gata kamoe han salah Teuntee dum kamoe ka meu meuiman
